response.sampleCollection: St14A cells co-transfected with 17Q-HTT 502 aa-HIS-HA-HA-HIS (H4 tag) or vector pcDNA3.1 control, together with FLAG-ubiquitin encoding plasmid

step1.details: St14A cells were transiently co-transfected with 17Q-HTT 502 aa-HIS-HA-HA-HIS (H4 tag) or vector pcDNA3.1 control, together with FLAG-ubiquitin encoding plasmid.

step2.details: Two days after tranfection, intact cells were treated in vivo using formaldehyde (0.05%), washed, and lysed.

step3.details: After clarification, the resulting supernatants were tandem-purified using either 1.) ANTI-FLAG M2 Affinity Gel beads followed by Anti-HA Affinity Matrix beads, or 2.) Anti-HA Affinity Matrix beads followed by ANTI-FLAG M2 Affinity Gel beads; immunoprecipitated conjugates were eluted using respective FLAG or HA peptide.

step4.details: The tandem-purified proteins were then digested via FASP using trypsin overnight

step5.details: cleaned using Sep-Pak C18 cartridges prior to LC MS/MS analysis.
